  • Uses of WebServerFactoryCustomizer in org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.web.server

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AccessLogCustomizer<T extends WebServerFactory>
    Base class for a WebServerFactoryCustomizer that customizes the web server's access log.
    class 
    ManagementWebServerFactoryCustomizer<T extends ConfigurableWebServerFactory>
    WebServerFactoryCustomizer that customizes the WebServerFactory used to create the management context's web server.
